column5: Youâ€™ll love my place because it is a unique condo overlooking Schooner Cove and next door to the Lakeway Marina & the Lakeway Resort and Spa. Condos overlook Schooner Cove on the south shore of Lake Travis. The condos are in close proximity to: Boating, swimming, golfing, parks and much more! My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and families (with kids).
